name: neotoppm
description:
neotoppm -
convert an Atari Neochrome .neo into a portable pixmap
body:
neotoppm

NAME

neotoppm - convert an Atari Neochrome .neo into a portable pixmap

SYNOPSIS

neotoppm [neofile]

DESCRIPTION

Reads an Atari Neochrome .neo file as input. Produces a portable pixmap as output.

SEE ALSO

ppmtoneo(1), ppm(5)

AUTHOR
